args:
The prince's party defeats the fiend thought to
be the source of the calamity, but the dragon-
vein spring is not restored. The true source of
the trouble turns out to be the powerful fiend
Valfarre, who the prince and his companions
head for the space between worlds to defeat.
This should sort out the problem and see\nthe dragon-vein spring restored.
Yeah, it SHOULD...but I'm also getting\na strange feeling here.
A strange feeling indeed. At any rate,\nwe should head back and inform Peng Lai.
There's black mana flowing out of it!\nWell, this is certainly sub-optimal.
He's right. If we make contact with\nblack mana, there's no telling what\neffect it might have.
Why is this happening? Did we not defeat\nthe fiend responsible for the trouble here?
Oh, I was an old fool, and no mistake.\nOur real problem wasn't the spring\ndryin' up. The real problem is...
Valfarre's the fiend Xu Fu and I sealed\naway a hundred years ago. I failed to\nsee that seal's finally comin' undone.
It was actually a GOOD thing that other\nfiend had been takin' the mana from here!
Valfarre's a fiend who eats endless\namounts of mana. And so long as\nthere's any around...it's invincible.
That's why we sealed it away in the space\nbetween worlds. There's no true mana\nthere.
But looks like the critter was somehow\nable to tap into the dragon-vein spring.
It probably woulda come through already\nif not for that other fiend you young'uns\njust took care of.
Then by defeating that other fiend,\nwe are responsible for Valfarre's arrival!
Hush now—this here's my problem,\nand I'm gonna fix it.
Now then, if this ends up badly for me,\nI need you to gather up the folks in\nPeng Lai and lead 'em to a safe location.
Valfarre, you durn interloper! I ain't\ngonna let you harm my children!
Leavin' an old geezer to lay his life on\nthe line while we stand around really\ndon't sit well with me.
Then let's not wait—we'll head into the\nspace between worlds and defeat Valfarre!

Now that's a load'a tomfoolery if ever
I heard it! Xu Fu and I were barely able
to seal that feller away, and you think
you're gonna DEFEAT him?!
You yourself said we are all your children,\nPeng Lai.
So it's time to prove to you that children\ncan surpass their parents!
Hooo... Ooh hoo!\nOOOH HOO HOO HOOOOOO!
Well, I reckon maybe you're right—\nit's time for this old fart to stand back\nand let his children take the lead.

Young'uns can indeed surpass their
parents. And if you truly love 'em,
you gotta send 'em out to face
the world.
I reckon I got no choice but to put all'a\nmy faith and trust in you!
Still, it's a good thing we got this visitor\nhere with the dragon blood. You make sure\nto take good care of my children, hear?
But visitor or no, Valfarre is a problem\nthat extends far beyond Peng Lai.
Indeed. If left unchecked, it could spread\ncalamity across the entire continent.
So that's why we can't just ignore this,\neven if we wanted to.
Seems like us elders have just been\ngettin' in the way of you young'uns.
Right then, children! Get in there and\nshow that Valfarre what-for!
